text: Franklin/Van Buren was a station on the Chicago Transit Authority's Metropolitan Main Line. The station was located at Franklin Street and Van Buren Street in downtown Chicago. Franklin/Van Buren opened on October 11, 1897 and closed exactly 58 years later on October 11, 1955. ==References== Category:Defunct Chicago "L" stations Category:Railway stations in the United States opened in 1897 Category:Railway stations closed in 1955 Category:1897 establishments in Illinois Category:1955 disestablishments in Illinois Category:Former North Shore Line stations
title: Franklin/Van Buren station
